text: @JolyonMaugham @MattHancock cd #Cummings be charged with reckless endangerment.  he chose to travel 270 miles knowing that he had #Covid19 - where did he refuel? did he or his wife or his 4 y/old child use a service station toilet? how many ppl were infected as a result of this trip? how many died? #resign

domain.name: Person
